info.name: Ronald Rivero
info.title: FullStack and AWS Cloud Developer - GenAI

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a FullStack Developer and AWS Cloud Developer, passionate about Linux and the open source ethos. Using Python, C, and JavaScript, I craft high-performance REST APIs and dynamic SPAs/PWAs. My thirst for knowledge drives me to explore emerging technologies like Generative AI, Machine Learning, and quantum computing. As a programming and hardware tutor, I inspire the next generation to apply technology with ethical foundations and a vision aimed at maximizing its positive impact on society.
